mapper.sql: id as id , major_code as majorCode , degree_offered as degreeOffered , schooling_duration as schoolingDuration , offer_courses as offerCourses , major_introduce as majorIntroduce , specialisation as specialisation , createDate as createDate , creator as creator , lastModDate as lastModDate , lastModifier as lastModifier , id_delete as idDelete
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO zgk_major_detail ( major_code, degree_offered, schooling_duration, offer_courses, major_introduce, specialisation, createDate, creator, lastModDate, lastModifier, id_delete ) VALUES ( #{majorCode}, #{degreeOffered}, #{schoolingDuration}, #{offerCourses}, #{majorIntroduce}, #{specialisation}, #{createDate}, #{creator}, #{lastModDate}, #{lastModifier}, #{idDelete} )
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS ID
mapper.update:
UPDATE zgk_major_detail
major_code = #{majorCode},
degree_offered = #{degreeOffered},
schooling_duration = #{schoolingDuration},
offer_courses = #{offerCourses},
major_introduce = #{majorIntroduce},
specialisation = #{specialisation},
createDate = #{createDate},
creator = #{creator},
lastModDate = #{lastModDate},
lastModifier = #{lastModifier},
id_delete = #{idDelete},
WHERE id = #{id}

UPDATE zgk_major_detail
major_code = #{map.majorCode},
degree_offered = #{map.degreeOffered},
schooling_duration = #{map.schoolingDuration},
offer_courses = #{map.offerCourses},
major_introduce = #{map.majorIntroduce},
specialisation = #{map.specialisation},
createDate = #{map.createDate},
creator = #{map.creator},
lastModDate = #{map.lastModDate},
lastModifier = #{map.lastModifier},
id_delete = #{map.idDelete},
WHERE id = #{map.id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO zgk_major_detail ( major_code, degree_offered, schooling_duration, offer_courses, major_introduce, specialisation, createDate, creator, lastModDate, lastModifier, id_delete ) VALUES ( #{map.majorCode}, #{map.degreeOffered}, #{map.schoolingDuration}, #{map.offerCourses}, #{map.majorIntroduce}, #{map.specialisation}, #{map.createDate}, #{map.creator}, #{map.lastModDate}, #{map.lastModifier}, #{map.idDelete} )
mapper.select:
SELECT
, id
, major_code
, degree_offered
, schooling_duration
, offer_courses
, major_introduce
, specialisation
, createDate
, creator
, lastModDate
, lastModifier
, id_delete
FROM zgk_major_detail
AND id like CONCAT('%', #{condition.id} , '%')
AND major_code like CONCAT('%', #{condition.majorCode} , '%')
AND degree_offered like CONCAT('%', #{condition.degreeOffered} , '%')
AND schooling_duration like CONCAT('%', #{condition.schoolingDuration} , '%')
AND offer_courses like CONCAT('%', #{condition.offerCourses} , '%')
AND major_introduce like CONCAT('%', #{condition.majorIntroduce} , '%')
AND specialisation like CONCAT('%', #{condition.specialisation} , '%')
AND createDate like CONCAT('%', #{condition.createDate} , '%')
AND creator like CONCAT('%', #{condition.creator} , '%')
AND lastModDate like CONCAT('%', #{condition.lastModDate} , '%')
AND lastModifier like CONCAT('%', #{condition.lastModifier} , '%')
AND id_delete like CONCAT('%', #{condition.idDelete} , '%')
ORDER BY ${orderBy} ${sortBy}
